ComicInfo.Title: Same Old Thing; Switzerland, We Are Here!; Surprise Visit; Not Them!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Same Old Thing: On a typical same-old-day like any other day, a ghost appears in Tom’s kitchen, making the day anything but “same-old”.
Switzerland, We Are Here!: Tom becomes an “ice-skating waiter” at a mountaintop Swiss restaurant, with a smooth and icy outdoor terrace dining area overlooking a high cliff… Oh, and he can’t control his skates!
Surprise Visit: Jerry’s Uncle Clug, “the clumsiest guy in the world”, is coming to visit. Tom hurriedly “clumsy-proofs” the house in dread anticipation.
Not Them!: Tom tries to put an end to an argument between Jerry and Tuffy because “…they’re supposed to be fighting with me, not each other”.
